About: InsightIQ is a platform that offers influencer marketing solutions, helping brands connect with influencers to promote their products or services through social media channels.
Mission: InsightIQ aims to solve the problem of finding the right influencers who align with a brand's values and audience, as well as streamlining the management and tracking of influencer marketing campaigns.

Testimonials.Name: Manzoor Samad
Testimonials.Testimonial: insightIQ has helped Impulze immensely in scaling our product. We could build both our Chrome extension and Discovery features using them. The best part is the flexibility they provide with data.

Testimonials.Name: Sumit Nihalani
Testimonials.Testimonial: I like their product very much, their offerings have helped us build a very important feature in our web app at Passionfroot. Docs are very friendly and the team is always ready to help us ship faster and unblock us if we are confused at any stage.

Testimonials.Name: Till Musshoff
Testimonials.Testimonial: insightIQ has enabled us to access creator data from a large number of platforms on day 1 rather than going and integrating with each platform; that was not feasible for us and would have taken a lot of time and effort.

Testimonials.Name: Laura Lane
Testimonials.Testimonial: InsightIQ lets us search and find influencers based on the creator's interests or things they've talked about. No other platform has been able to do that. And it's been restrictive to find the right influencer for us...until now!

Testimonials.Name: Emily Cegielski Gianakos
Testimonials.Testimonial: insightIQ is super intuitive. I haven't seen any tool that filters creator data at this granular level before. It's really impressive.

Testimonials.Name: Julia Garcia
Testimonials.Testimonial: I think it's quite powerful that insightIQ is able to classify what audience sentiments or comments really mean or bring to the brand.

Testimonials.Name: Tanishq Mehta
Testimonials.Testimonial: We were able to find, filter, and finalize influencers whose audience displayed higher purchase intent. This helped us get our clients better results than ever done before - and with just a few clicks!

Testimonials.Name: Saad Qureshi
Testimonials.Testimonial: The insights offered for a creator is exceptional. I can now easily get interesting & highly relevant creator suggestions as well.

Testimonials.Name: Ace Gapuz
Testimonials.Testimonial: insightIQ's ability to show the per post engagement rate and then the comments analysis is incredible. That's something we don't find with other solutions.

Testimonials.Name: Chase Greene
Testimonials.Testimonial: The platform has been awesome. It has made life a lot easier!
